virtual std::string claragenomics::cudaaligner::Alignment::convert_to_cigar ( ) const
pure virtual

Converts an alignment to CIGAR format. The is a reduced implementation of the CIGAR standard supporting only M, I and D states.

Returns
CIGAR string
